name: smart-pool-controller
description: Multi-tenant IoT Pool Controller - Cloudflare Pages Functions + D1

scripts.db:migrate:local: wrangler d1 execute smart-pool-controller-db --local --file=./migrations/0001_create_users_table.sql && wrangler d1 execute smart-pool-controller-db --local --file=./migrations/0002_create_mqtt_credentials_table.sql && wrangler d1 execute smart-pool-controller-db --local --file=./migrations/0003_create_devices_table.sql && wrangler d1 execute smart-pool-controller-db --local --file=./migrations/0004_create_sessions_table.sql
scripts.db:migrate:remote: wrangler d1 execute smart-pool-controller-db --remote --file=./migrations/0001_create_users_table.sql && wrangler d1 execute smart-pool-controller-db --remote --file=./migrations/0002_create_mqtt_credentials_table.sql && wrangler d1 execute smart-pool-controller-db --remote --file=./migrations/0003_create_devices_table.sql && wrangler d1 execute smart-pool-controller-db --remote --file=./migrations/0004_create_sessions_table.sql
scripts.secrets:set: echo 'Run: wrangler secret put JWT_SECRET && wrangler secret put HIVEMQ_API_TOKEN && wrangler secret put MQTT_BROKER_URL'
